vac.title: Information regarding Valve Anti Cheat
vac.description:
Playing IW4x will not result in a VAC ban on your Steam profile, regardless of it's integration.

IW4x connects to Steam for your friends list.

dlc.title: Download DLCs
dlc.description: Use one of the following methods to download the IW4x DLCs:

game.title: Download Modern Warfare 2
game.description: Use one of the following methods to download a copy of the Modern Warfare 2 basegame:

iw4x.title: Install IW4x
iw4x.description: Please follow the guide below to install IW4x properly:

servers.title: Few servers
servers.description:
If you experience the issue of having few servers, please follow the following steps:

1. Open the ingame console and check the values for `net_serverQueryLimit` and `net_serverFrames`
2. Lower them both, step by step, until the amount of servers rise.
2b. Alternatively, set them to their minimum and increase them one by one until your server amount goes down.

fatal.title: Fatal error issue
fatal.description: If you encounter a fatal error on Windows 7, please try the steps in the following guide (might also help if you're on Windows 10):

fields.name: @IW4x Bot#3006 info
fields.value: Display technical information about the bot.

fields.name: @IW4x Bot#3006 joins
fields.value: Show how many members joined within the last week for each day.

fields.name: @IW4x Bot#3006 ping <IP[:Port]>
fields.value:
Try pinging the specied IP and Port.
If no port is specified, 28960 will be chosen as the default.

fields.name: @IW4x Bot#3006 iw4madmin
fields.value: Fetches and displays statistics about the current IW4MAdmin instances

fields.name: VAC Bans
fields.value: You cannot be VAC banned for playing IW4x.

fields.name: Fatal Error
fields.value: Please see [this](https://iw4x.tumblr.com/post/166171864664/fatal-error) guide for more information.

welcome:
__Welcome to IW4x!__

While you wait until you can type in the server, please read the rules in the <#320545187589783562> channel!

If you need help installing IW4x, please view this guide: https://iw4x.tumblr.com/post/161974206329/install-iw4x
If you have a problem with the client, please go to <#275267435945263104> and ask your question, Tech Support and I will do our best to help you!
If you'd rather attempt to get support in your language, please use the <#316612499262930944> channel!
Please use the <#260768564489748480> channel for anything not related to IW4x (offtopic content), thank you! :smiley:


Check out our partnered project, Plutonium (Black Ops 2), too:
Pluto: https://discord.gg/a6JM2Tv
muted:
__Welcome to IW4x!__

It appears you've been previously muted! To prevent people from circumventing their mutes through rejoining, you have been muted again! If you believe this is an error, please contact staff.
